price: 87. Haddaad (gaalada) weydiiso yaa abuuray iyaga, waxay odhan: Allaah. Ee xaggee baa loo iilay?
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَهُمۡ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqahum layaqūlunna al-lahu fa-annā yu'fakūna
